attributes.action: Launch a Parlimentary enquiry as to how Jack Staw is Secretary of State for Justice.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Due to Mr Straw's (in)action(s): 

1)Baby P's Mother will be able to able to apply for parole in 2012.  

2)Michael Shields has been refused parole (despite overwhelming evidence proving innocence over guilt).

3)The terminally ill Ronnie Biggs is considered a 'considerable risk' to society and has been refused parole.

In the undersigned's opinion, a parliamentary enquiry needs to be launched as to how someone advocating the aforementioned miscarriages of justice can remain in their position of Secretary of State for Justice.

rejection.details: As stated in our terms and conditions, we cannot accept petitions concerning individual legal cases. Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
